subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Former Villanova coach Rollie Massimino was back on the sideline Saturday night, coaching for tiny Northwood University in what wound up being a 97-60 loss to the Wildcats.
snippet: Former Villanova coach Rollie Massimino was back on the sideline Saturday night, coaching for tiny Northwood University in what wound up being a 97-60 loss to the Wildcats.
